entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
